text: was a professional Japanese baseball player. He was known for his long career with the Chunichi Dragons. He was born in Gifu, Gifu, Japan. Takagi played for the Dragons between 1960 to 1980. In 2006, he was added to the Japanese Baseball Hall of Fame. Takagi died on January 17, 2020 of heart failure at the age of 78.「ミスタードラゴンズ」高木守道さん急死 12日にはラジオ出演…急性心不全78歳 ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Japanese baseball players
title: Morimichi Takagi
